title: Unmasked
description: It's the craziest time of year in New Orleans, but Charlotte Marchand has never experienced a Mardi Gras quite like this. Someone on her staff is out to destroy her family's hotel, and as general manager, she can't let that happen. Even the unexpected return of her high school sweetheart, Jackson Bailey, can't completely distract her. But it's only when the two of them are kidnapped and their lives are at risk that Charlotte reaches the stunning Jackson is the only man she's ever loved.
author: Ingrid Weaver
